source.7ec0b3b9:
Steps of the test:
1) Check if normality assumption holds :use shapiro, if p_value<0.05 normality doesn't hold

2) Check if variance homogenity holds :use levene, if p_value<0.05  variance homogenity doesn't hold
*  if these two hold then apply two sample t-test
* if they do not hold then apply mannwhitneyu
note: If normality holds but variance homogenity doesn't, then apply two sample t-test with entering arguman to the function.If normality does not hold, apply mannwhitneyu.
